strapiPost.title: Unleash Summer During The Dam Slam Pickleball Tournament At Osage Park
strapiPost.content:
Start looking for your pickleball partner! Dam Slam, Osage Park's first-ever pickleball tournament, is coming to Bentonville on June 3-4.

  • Double-doubles: Two full days of pickleball madness, June 3 will include a men's and women's doubles tournament followed by a day of coed doubles on June 4 with divisions for all levels of play.
  • Don't wait: Registration is already open, and the entry fee is $40 per person or $60 to play both days.

Grab your partner and register for the tournament HERE.
